charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
met Brendan in the forest.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1101_0200_2:
Brendan was troubled about his partner
Pokémon, Latios.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_0300_1:
Pasio is a nice place, but for Latios, it’s a pretty
dramatic change in environment.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_0400_1: That’s why I wanna do anything I can for him!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_0500_1:
In order to do that, I want to know more
about Latios.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_0600_1: Especially because of what happened before...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_0401_0800_1:
Well... Y’see, I thought Latios was a Pokémon that
doesn’t like to fight...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_0402_1000_1: Yeah. There was a small incident...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1100_1:
Just over there, we saw a boy surrounded
by Team Break.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1200_1: I wanted to go help, but Latios stopped me...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1300_1: Why not, Latios? We should go help him!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1400_1: Whoa, look at him go! He defeated Team Break!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1500_1:
Yeah, that sync pair was super strong...but they
hadn’t tapped into that power yet.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1600_1: Latios believed the boy could overcome it.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1700_1:
If I had helped the boy, he might have not been
able to learn just how strong he really is...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_1900_1:
It’s not that Latios is a Pokémon that
dislikes fighting…
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_2000_1:
It’s a Pokémon that knows when it’s the right time
to fight!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_2100_1:
Ever since then, I borrow his strength without 
hesitation when it’s the right time to fight.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_2600_1:
By the way... Change of subject, but there’s a
rumor that blue and red Pokémon have been
spotted flying around different regions.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_0401_2900_1: Really? Tell me the details later!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_0402_3100_1: I see... It must be unusual, then...
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3200_1:
It seems like my Latios gets pretty lonely
sometimes.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3300_1:
Someday, I want to find if there are any friends
for him out there.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3400_1:
Well... I guess he seems happy when he’s
with Latias.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3500_1: Of course, I’ll be with Latios from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3600_1:
But I’m sure Latios would be happy if it made
even more friends!
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3700_1:
After all, I was happy when I made a lot of
friends on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0019_10_yuki/2301_1201_3800_1:
That feeling must be the same for both people
and Pokémon!
